description_for_human: Plugin for managing a wordpress site, you can add, get, remove WP posts and plugins.
description_for_model: Plugin for managing a wordpress site, you can add, get, remove WP posts and plugins. Adding post content should be good html code for json that should not occur any parse error. If user does not log in show them the unique login link from /login. if user confirm you after log in manually try to get the auth token using the last uid you got. use old token first if you already have one and you face no problem, otherwise if you get error using old token you could show the login link again. Compare and give your comment when find plugins. Using debug you should suggest how to solve specific warning or error.
